injects.description: Helpdesk receives a call from 'John Doe' claiming to be from IT Security. He says there is a data breach and needs to 'synchronize' the user's MFA device.
User 'Alice' reports receiving a text message with an MFA code that she didn't request, followed by a call from 'IT' asking for the code.
injects.goal: Test user awareness and reporting flow.

injects.description: SIEM alerts on 'SHINY-001': New MFA device enrolled for Alice, followed by OAuth consent for 'M365 Audit Tool'.
injects.goal: Test SOC detection and containment speed.

injects.description: Alice's account begins bulk downloading files from SharePoint via the new OAuth app.
injects.goal: Test automated vs manual containment actions.

expected_outcomes: Helpdesk refuses to provide MFA code or change settings without call-back.
User Alice reports the vishing attempt immediately.
SOC revokes Alice's sessions and the malicious OAuth token within 15 minutes of the alert.
